Based on this property, we design a non-Hermitian acoustic flat lens to focus on the acoustic plane wave.
shows the schematic diagram of the flat lens, which offers more possibilities for controlling the
geometric freedom of metamaterials. The hyperboloidal phase profile along the y direction is used to realize
acoustic point focusing at a distance
from the structure. For a given focal length
